# This file is autogenerated
title: sendEmailOtp
description: Overview of the sendEmailOtp method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/sendEmailOtp
---

Sends an OTP (One-Time Password) to the specified email address for authentication.
The OTP will be sent to the user's email and can be submitted using submitOtpCode().

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/signer";
```

## Usage

```ts
await authClient.sendEmailOtp({ email: "user@example.com" });
// User will receive an OTP code via email
```

## Parameters

### params

`SendEmailOtpParams`

- Parameters for sending the email OTP

### params.email

`string`

- Email address to send the OTP to

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
Promise that resolves when the OTP has been sent
